content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Water Supply System at position(-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=-0.5), storage tank (position x=-6.5, y=-0.5) and pipes connecting them (PipeGroup at position x=-8.5, y=-0.5). The water supply system is also connected to the boiler (position x=21.5, y=44.0) through a complex network of pipes (PipeGroup at position x=-8.5, y=-0.5).

### Crude Oil Extraction System at position(17.5, 40.5)
Consists of pumpjack (position x=17.5, y=40.5), crude oil storage tank (position x=21.5, y=40.5) and pipes connecting them (PipeGroup at position x=18.5, y=38.5).

### Electricity Generation System at position(21.5, 44.0)
Consists of boiler (position x=21.5, y=44.0), steam engine (position x=25.5, y=46.5) and pipes connecting boiler to steam engine (PipeGroup at position x=21.5, y=42.5). The steam engine is also connected to the pumpjack and oil refinery through power poles (ElectricityGroup id=79858).

### Oil Refinery at position(29.5, 39.5)
Consists of oil refinery (position x=29.5, y=39.5) connected to the crude oil storage tank through pipes and to the steam engine through power poles.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities at occupied or unplaceable positions
- Ensure the target location is clear and placeable before attempting to place an entity. (Step 3)

### Errors when connecting entities with pipes
- Ensure entities are properly aligned and positioned to be connected with pipes. Clear potential blockages before attempting to connect entities. (Step 5, Step 6, Step 11)

### Errors when inspecting inventory of entities
- Ensure the entity has an inventory before attempting to inspect it. (Step 9)

### Errors when accessing attributes of entities
- Ensure the attribute exists for the entity before attempting to access it. (Step 10)

### Errors when connecting entities without fluid in the source entity
- Ensure the source entity has fluid in it before attempting to connect it to another entity. (Step 8)

### Errors when clearing pipes
- Ensure the argument passed to clear pipes is an Entity or Prototype object. (Step 15)

## NAMESPACE

No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
